While this western is often considered an "off-spring" of "Seven 
Samurai",=
 I think it has more to do wiht the notion of skilled men 
adding a group o=
f people than with an actual "code".  It plays into 
the notion of the "cow=
boy with a conscience" that forms the backbone 
of most westerns, a charact=
er with a clear sense of "right and wrong", 
risking his life for "right". =
 This is a mythic sort of character, 
which was blended with the "high conc=
ept" of professionals helping the 
helpless.

KJJ
